senses.sense_definition: Relating to or characteristic of the German philosopher Friedrich Nietzsche or his philosophy.

examples.text: The professor gave a lecture on <w>Nietzschean</w> philosophy and its impact on modern thought.
Her novel explores the <w>Nietzschean</w> concept of the will to power.
He adopted a <w>Nietzschean</w> position regarding the nature of good and evil.

senses.sense_definition: A supporter or follower of the ideas of Friedrich Nietzsche.

examples.text: As a devout <w>Nietzschean</w>, he rejected many traditional moral values.
She had developed into a consistent, practising <w>Nietzschean</w>.
